code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddLocation=_ref=>{let{getLocations,setAddVisibility,addVisible}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState("");const addLocation=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const body={name};await fetch("/api/locations",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(body)});setName("");getLocations();setAddVisibility(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"add-location-modal",style:{opacity:addVisible?"1":"0",pointerEvents:addVisible?"auto":"none"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:e=>{addLocation(e);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"modal-title",children:"Add a location"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"input-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Location Name",value:name,onChange:e=>{setName(e.target.value);},required:true})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"btn-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>{setAddVisibility(false);},children:"Close"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-background",onClick:()=>{setAddVisibility(false);}})]});};export default AddLocation;
